auto_refresh_desc: Checks network health before transactions and intelligently retries failed ones
transaction_failed_network: Transaction failed to broadcast to network. Please check your connection and try again.
wallet_not_connected: Wallet not connected. Please connect your wallet and try again.
insufficient_balance: Insufficient balance. Please check your balance and try again.
how_it_works_description: This is where you'll explain how your DEX functions, bonding curves, etc.
click_to_open_explorer: Click to open in Stacks Explorer
no_profitable_traders: No profitable traders in this period
get_free_fake_bitcoin: Get Free Fake Bitcoin for Trading
enter_token_dex_id: Please enter both Token ID and DEX ID.
terms_agreement_notice: By accessing or using Teiko Labs, you automatically agree to these terms and acknowledge all risks
teiko_labs_no_responsibility: Teiko Labs accepts absolutely no responsibility or liability for:
financial_losses_desc: Any loss of funds, sBTC, treasury ownership tokens, or digital assets
project_failures_desc: Failed crowdfunding projects, abandoned developments, or project scams
treasury_ownership_risks_desc: Loss of majority holder status, locked ownership tokens, or inability to claim trading fees
smart_contract_risks_desc: Bugs, exploits, or vulnerabilities in Clarity smart contracts
sbtc_stacks_risks_desc: Issues with sBTC peg, Stacks blockchain failures, or network congestion
market_manipulation_desc: Price manipulation, wash trading, or coordinated attacks
wallet_security_desc: Loss of private keys, wallet hacks, or unauthorized transactions
technical_failures_desc: Platform downtime, transaction failures, or data loss
regulatory_actions_desc: Legal or regulatory consequences in any jurisdiction, including fines, penalties, or criminal prosecution
tax_liabilities_desc: Any tax obligations, penalties, or legal consequences arising from your activities
compliance_failures_desc: Consequences of failing to comply with your country's laws and regulations
use_at_own_risk: You use Teiko Labs entirely at your own risk!
experimental_technology_desc: sBTC and Stacks blockchain technology are experimental and may contain unknown vulnerabilities that could result in total loss of funds.
potential_loss_funds_desc: You may lose 100% of any funds, sBTC, or treasury ownership tokens you interact with on this platform. Treasury ownership competition means you could lose majority holder status at any time.
token_locking_mechanism_desc: Treasury ownership tokens may become permanently locked based on platform mechanics. Unlocking requires specific revenue thresholds that may never be met.
no_project_verification_desc: Teiko Labs does not verify, audit, or endorse any crowdfunding projects on the platform. Project creators may abandon projects or misuse funds.
no_investment_advice_desc: Nothing on this platform constitutes financial, investment, legal, or tax advice. All project funding decisions are yours alone.
regulatory_compliance_desc: You must comply with ALL laws in your country regarding cryptocurrency, securities, crowdfunding, and DeFi activities. Some jurisdictions prohibit or restrict these activities. Penalties may include fines, asset seizure, or criminal prosecution.
platform_description_intro: is a Bitcoin-powered crowdfunding platform where users can:
platform_feature_1: Create crowdfunding projects with 21 million units of treasury ownership
platform_feature_2: Trade treasury ownership tokens using sBTC on Stacks blockchain
platform_feature_3: Compete to become majority holders to claim 1.5% trading fees from every transaction
platform_feature_4: Lock ownership tokens to secure majority holder status
platform_feature_5: Participate in decentralized project funding and profit distribution
platform_disclaimer: Teiko Labs is purely a technology platform. We do not control project outcomes, smart contract execution, or fund custody.
age_requirement_desc: You must be at least 18 years old to use Teiko Labs
legal_capacity_desc: You must have legal capacity to enter into contracts in your jurisdiction
wallet_security_responsibility_desc: You are solely responsible for your wallet security, private keys, and seed phrases
due_diligence_desc: You must research all projects before funding (#DYOR - Do Your Own Research)
legal_compliance_responsibility_desc: You must comply with ALL applicable laws and regulations in your country, state, province, and local jurisdiction, including but not limited to securities laws, tax obligations, anti-money laundering (AML) requirements, and know-your-customer (KYC) regulations
jurisdictional_responsibility_desc: You are solely responsible for determining whether your use of Teiko Labs is legal in your jurisdiction. We do not provide legal advice regarding compliance
prohibited_jurisdictions_desc: You must not use the platform if cryptocurrency trading, crowdfunding, or DeFi activities are prohibited in your jurisdiction
tax_obligations_desc: You are responsible for reporting and paying all taxes on your activities, including capital gains, income from trading fees, and any other tax liabilities in your country
anti_fraud_desc: You must not engage in market manipulation, wash trading, or fraudulent activities
project_verification_desc: You acknowledge that project creators may be anonymous and unverified
treasury_ownership_competition_desc: Multiple users compete for majority holder status. You may lose majority status and trading fee rights to other users at any time without warning.
token_locking_mechanism_risk_desc: Locked ownership tokens cannot be unlocked until specific revenue thresholds are met. These thresholds may never be reached, permanently locking your tokens.
trading_fee_structure_desc: Trading fees are not guaranteed. Low trading volume means minimal fees. Platform mechanics may change fee distribution at any time.
fixed_token_supply_desc: Fixed supply may create artificial scarcity or dilution effects. Early buyers may have unfair advantages over later participants.
crowdfunding_project_risks_desc: Projects may fail, be abandoned, or be fraudulent. Project creators may disappear with funds. No guarantees exist for project completion or success.
cryptocurrency_trading_risk: Trading cryptocurrency and digital assets involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for all investors.
total_loss_funds_desc: You may lose all money invested in treasury ownership tokens
market_volatility_desc: Token prices can fluctuate dramatically and unpredictably
no_guaranteed_returns_desc: Trading fees and profits are not guaranteed
majority_holder_competition_desc: Other users may outbid you for majority holder status
locked_funds_desc: Ownership tokens may become locked based on platform mechanics
smart_contract_risk_desc: Bugs or vulnerabilities in Clarity smart contracts may cause loss of funds
blockchain_risk_desc: Issues with Stacks blockchain or sBTC peg may affect functionality
platform_downtime_desc: Technical issues may prevent access to funds or trading
wallet_security_risk_desc: Loss of private keys results in permanent loss of funds
uncertain_legal_status_desc: Regulatory treatment of digital assets may change
compliance_requirements_desc: You may be subject to tax or reporting obligations
jurisdictional_restrictions_desc: Use may be prohibited in certain jurisdictions
no_investment_advice_desc: Nothing on this Platform constitutes investment, financial, trading, or other advice. All content is for informational purposes only. You should consult with qualified professionals before making any investment decisions.
platform_disclaimer_1: The Platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind
platform_disclaimer_2: We do not guarantee Platform availability, functionality, or security
platform_disclaimer_3: We are not responsible for user-generated content or project outcomes
platform_disclaimer_4: We do not custody funds or control smart contract operations
platform_disclaimer_5: Third-party integrations (wallets, explorers) are used at your own risk
limitation_liability_desc: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING FROM YOUR USE OF THE PLATFORM, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOSS OF FUNDS, PROFITS, OR DATA.
prohibited_activity_3: Attempting to exploit smart contract vulnerabilities
prohibited_activity_4: Using the Platform for money laundering or illegal activities
prohibited_activity_6: Interfering with Platform operations or other users
modifications_termination_desc: We reserve the right to modify these terms, update the Platform, or terminate services at any time without notice. Continued use after modifications constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
governing_law_desc: These terms are governed by applicable law. Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration where permitted by law.
acknowledgment_intro: By using this platform, you acknowledge that:
acknowledgment_1: You have read and understood these Terms of Service and Risk Disclaimer
acknowledgment_2: You understand the substantial risks involved in cryptocurrency trading
acknowledgment_3: You are using the Platform at your own risk and responsibility
acknowledgment_4: You may lose all funds invested in treasury ownership tokens
acknowledgment_5: No returns or profits are guaranteed
acknowledgment_6: You are responsible for compliance with applicable laws
contact_desc: For questions about these terms, please contact us through our official channels.
look_for_connect_wallet_button: Look for the "Connect Wallet" button in the top right corner
wallet_set_to_mainnet: Make sure your wallet is set to mainnet (address starts with "SP")
wallet_set_to_testnet: Make sure your wallet is set to testnet (address starts with "ST")
connect_wallet_try_again: Connect your wallet and try again
mainnet_trading_warning: Warning: Mainnet trading uses real Bitcoin. Make sure you understand the risks and only trade with funds you can afford to lose.
testnet_trading_note: Note: Mainnet wallets (addresses starting with "SP") are not supported for practice trading. Practice trading uses fake money on testnet only.
real_tokens_coming_soon: Real tokens with real value will be available here.
practice_tokens_coming_soon: Practice tokens will be available here.
admin_configure_tokens: Admin can configure tokens in the admin panel
project_creation_development: Project creation feature is currently under development. Stay tuned for updates!
feature_being_updated_desc: This feature is currently being updated. Please check back soon for the latest improvements!
connect_wallet_pnl_msg: Connect your wallet to view profit & loss data
